mapper.select: select w.nick_name,w.avatar_url,g.* from goods_comment as g inner join wx_user as w on g.openid = w.openid where g.goods_id =#{goodsId}

SELECT c.*,u.avatar_url,u.nick_name,gs.goods_name,gs.goods_image FROM goods_comment as c inner join wx_user as u on c.openid = u.openid inner join sys_goods as gs on gs.goods_id = c.goods_id order by c.create_time desc
